welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Groningen, a charming city known for its beautiful canals, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eelde Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
